title: Welcome to Marmite
html: This is your first post! Edit this content edit on content/{date}-welcome.md Add more content create new markdown files in the content folder use marmite --new to create new content Customize your site edit marmite.yaml to change site settings edit the files starting with _ in the content folder to change the layout or edit the templates to create a custom layout Deploy your site read more on marmite documentation

title: About
html: Hi, edit about.md to change this content.
